content: For release on delivery  2:00 p.m. EDT (7:00 p.m. local time)  May 21, 2015      Past, Present, and Future Challenges for the Euro Area         Remarks by     Stanley Fischer     Vice Chairman     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at     the ECB Forum on Central Banking conference     “Inflation and Unemployment in Europe”      Sintra, Portugal                 May 21, 2015
